title: Refine UI/UX to match Google, Apple, and cloud provider design standards

requirements.text: Update frontend/src/index.css and frontend/tailwind.config.js to implement a refined color palette with subtle gradients and elevated depth matching modern design systems, using softer neutrals, elevated shadows (with multiple layers), and sophisticated color tokens that avoid bright primary colors in favor of understated elegance

quotes: make it look and work like it was developed by google, apple and cloud

acceptanceCriteria: Color palette uses sophisticated neutrals with subtle color accents
Shadow system includes multiple elevation levels (sm, md, lg, xl, 2xl) with soft, layered shadows
Design avoids overly saturated colors in favor of muted, professional tones
Theme tokens support both light and dark modes with proper contrast ratios

requirements.text: Refine all page components (HomePage.tsx, DashboardPage.tsx, SearchPage.tsx, PropertyDetailsPage.tsx, RegisterPage.tsx, TransferPage.tsx) with polished spacing using consistent padding scale (4, 8, 12, 16, 24, 32, 48, 64px), refined typography hierarchy with proper font weights and line heights, and generous whitespace between sections

quotes: make it look and work like it was developed by google, apple and cloud

acceptanceCriteria: All pages use a consistent spacing scale with no arbitrary values
Typography follows a clear hierarchy with appropriate font sizes, weights, and line heights
Sections have generous breathing room with proper margin/padding between content blocks
Content width is constrained to readable measures (max-w-7xl or similar) on large screens

requirements.text: Add smooth micro-interactions and polished animations to all interactive elements including buttons, cards, form inputs, and navigation items with subtle scale transforms on hover (scale-[1.02]), smooth color transitions (transition-all duration-200), and tactile feedback using transform and shadow changes

quotes: make it look and work like it was developed by google, apple and cloud

acceptanceCriteria: All buttons include hover and active states with smooth transitions
Cards have subtle hover effects with elevation changes
Form inputs show clear focus states with smooth border/shadow animations
Navigation items respond to hover with appropriate visual feedback
All animations use consistent timing functions (ease-in-out or cubic-bezier curves)

requirements.text: Enhance Header.tsx and Footer.tsx with refined layouts including proper alignment, balanced spacing, subtle backdrop blur effects for the header, and refined mobile responsiveness with smooth menu transitions

quotes: make it look and work like it was developed by google, apple and cloud

acceptanceCriteria: Header includes backdrop blur and subtle shadow for depth
Navigation items are properly aligned with consistent spacing
Mobile menu transitions smoothly with slide or fade animations
Footer layout is balanced with clear visual hierarchy
All interactive elements have appropriate hover states

requirements.text: Refine form components in RegisterPage.tsx and TransferPage.tsx with polished input styling including refined borders, proper focus rings with brand colors, floating labels or clear placeholder text, inline validation feedback with smooth transitions, and cohesive button styling matching the overall design system

quotes: make it look and work like it was developed by google, apple and cloud

acceptanceCriteria: Form inputs have refined borders with smooth focus state transitions
Focus rings use brand colors and proper visibility
Labels and placeholders are clearly legible and well-positioned
Validation messages appear with smooth fade-in animations
Submit buttons have clear loading states with spinners or progress indicators
Form layout uses consistent spacing and alignment

requirements.text: Add skeleton loading states to all data-fetching components (DashboardPage.tsx, SearchPage.tsx, PropertyDetailsPage.tsx) using shimmer animations and content placeholders that match the final content structure, ensuring smooth transitions from loading to loaded states

quotes: make it look and work like it was developed by google, apple and cloud

acceptanceCriteria: Skeleton loaders match the structure and dimensions of actual content
Shimmer animation uses subtle gradient motion for visual polish
Transition from skeleton to content is smooth without layout shift
Loading states appear immediately without flash of empty content
Multiple skeleton items are rendered when lists are loading

requirements.text: Implement smooth page transitions and scroll behaviors across all routes in App.tsx using CSS transitions or animation libraries, with fade-in effects for new page content and smooth scrolling for in-page navigation

quotes: make it look and work like it was developed by google, apple and cloud

acceptanceCriteria: Page transitions include subtle fade or slide effects when navigating between routes
Scroll behavior is smooth for anchor links and programmatic scrolling
Page content fades in smoothly on initial render
Route transitions do not cause jarring content shifts
Animation timing is consistent across all transitions (typically 150-300ms)

requirements.text: Refine card components across all pages with elevated shadows, subtle border radius (rounded-lg or rounded-xl), proper internal padding, and hover states that include scale and shadow transitions to create depth and interactivity

quotes: make it look and work like it was developed by google, apple and cloud

acceptanceCriteria: All cards use consistent border radius and shadow values
Card shadows include multiple layers for realistic depth
Hover states smoothly increase elevation with transform and shadow changes
Internal card padding creates comfortable content spacing
Card backgrounds use subtle color differentiation from page background

requirements.text: Enhance responsive design across all pages to ensure layouts adapt gracefully to different screen sizes with appropriate breakpoints (sm, md, lg, xl, 2xl), mobile-first design patterns, and touch-friendly interface elements with adequate tap target sizes (minimum 44x44px)

quotes: make it look and work like it was developed by google, apple and cloud

acceptanceCriteria: All layouts follow mobile-first design principles
Content reflows naturally at all breakpoints without horizontal scrolling
Interactive elements meet minimum touch target size requirements on mobile
Navigation adapts appropriately for mobile (hamburger menu) and desktop (horizontal nav)
Grid layouts adjust column counts based on screen size
Typography scales appropriately across breakpoints

constraints: Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts or frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts
Do not modify any files in frontend/src/components/ui directory
Preserve all existing React Query hooks functionality in frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts
Maintain existing authentication flows and Internet Identity integration
Do not change backend/main.mo actor structure
nonGoals: Changing the technology stack or framework
Implementing new backend features or data models
Adding new pages or major functional components
Redesigning the information architecture or user flows
Changing the color scheme to use blue and purple gradients
Adding third-party animation libraries beyond Tailwind's built-in capabilities
